definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The significance of pathogenesis of Growth-hormone secreting pituitary adenomas.
sentences.chinese: 深入探讨垂体生长激素腺瘤发病机制的重要性。

sentences.english: Glutamine combined with rush had some synergetic effect on supporting bowel barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 联合应用谷氨酰胺和生长激素可改善肠粘膜功能。

sentences.english: Transsphenoidal microsurgical removal of 104cases of GH-secreting adenoma are reported.
sentences.chinese: 报告104例经蝶窦显微外科切除垂体生长激素腺瘤。

sentences.english: Yuan Yuan was nabbed with 13 vials of growth hormone .
sentences.chinese: 原媛携带13小瓶生长激素被抓。

sentences.english: But growth hormones are not a cure for PWS or for obesity.
sentences.chinese: 但生长激素并不能治愈PW综合征或肥胖。

sentences.english: This paper reports that growth-hormone gene effects growth of common carp.
sentences.chinese: 本文报导了生长激素基因对鲤鱼生长影响的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between the mutation of growth hormone-related genes and primary amenorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生长激素相关基因突变与原发闭经的关系。

sentences.english: Examples of human secreted proteins turned into therapeutics are insulin and the human growth hormone.
sentences.chinese: 人类分泌蛋白用于治疗的例子如胰岛素和人生长激素。

sentences.english: Besides, the GH gene of donkey was sequenced and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 并测定和分析了驴的生长激素基因序列。

sentences.english: It showed that the patient was producing a huge amount of growth hormone.
sentences.chinese: 测试表明该患者体内分泌大量生长激素。

sentences.english: Should You Buy A GHD Flat Iron?
sentences.chinese: 如果你购买了生长激素缺乏症扁铁？

sentences.english: Somatropin has not been shown to increase the occurrence of scoliosis.
sentences.chinese: 生长激素并未显示出提高脊柱侧凸的发生率。

sentences.english: Growth spurts are accelerated during sleep, as the human growth hormone is released.
sentences.chinese: 睡觉时分泌的生长激素进一步加快生长突增速度。

sentences.english: Insufficient sleep affects growth hormone secretion that is linked to obesity.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足，影响生长激素的分泌，导致肥胖。

sentences.english: PAGE and immunoelectrophoresis analysis indicates that the expressed protein ia bovine growth hormone.
sentences.chinese: 免疫电泳检查证明，表达的蛋白质是牛生长激素。
嗯，有人想起重组牛生长激素吗？

definition: anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)
